label: I-26 Photo 1258
description: Charleston Plywood and Lumber Co. building (side view) on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26). Surveyor notations on back of photo: "Dkt.: 10.490. Property owner: Minnie R. Sherman. Tract: 104-B. Station: 5829+20 Lt. Date: August 29, 1962. End to be moved by SCHD [SC Highway Department]." [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
